articles.title: Ford recalls 661,000 Explorer SUVs in Canada, U.S. and Mexico over roof rail concerns - CBC.ca
articles.description: Ford is recalling 661,000 Explorer sport utility vehicles in North America, including 36,419 in Canada, at the request of U.S. regulators because retention pins could loosen and allow roof rail covers to detach from the vehicle.
